msContents.summary: This manuscript contains two texts one is a commentary on the Nyāya text named Tattvacintāmaṇi written by Gaṅgeśa Upādhyāya. The first text is incomplete. The second text is Āpastamba Śrauta sūtra. According to the completion statement in the manuscript it ends with the 4th question of the Āpastamba sūtra. Originally thin palm leaf is used as cover. New thick wooden cover guard folio is used to protect manuscript. Fron cover with the sticker of the titles : Maṇivyākhyā Nyāya by Maheśopādhyaya Granth . 260 8 lines Āpastambasūtra by āpastamba Granth 4 Praśnas 88 6 lines.

msItem.title: Maṇivyākhyā
msItem.author: Gaṅgeśa Upādhyāya
msItem.incipit:
mani-1v-1 vijayavij (gap of more than 48 syllables as the line is broken.)
mani-1v-2 rāyaṇavaṃśyena mahopādhyāyayajvanā prakhāśyate prakāśotra maṇessovi?cit kvacit cikīrṣitagranthasyāvighnena parisamāptyarthatra (i)ṣṭadevatānāṃ prasannāva(2 illegible syllables due to damaged folio and rest of the part of the folio is broken.) mani-1v 3 rūpamaṃgalācaraṇaṃ śiṣyaśikṣāyai graṃthato nibadhnāti ..
msItem.explicit: mani-xr- 8[sa?] titi yathā granthaduṣaṇamapi duṣayati sukhapratitissakaraṇīketi nayanānyonyāśrayāditi bhāvaḥ manassiddhitikāraṇāntarāsaṃbhavāditibhavaḥ vṛ?ndīyatvañce (broken folio so remaining text is lost.)

msItem.title: Āpastaṃba Śrautasūtra
msItem.incipit:
apa-1v-1 (3-7 syllables are missing due to broken folio.) ye namaḥ . pratyakāvaśśīvatvāt pratyakṣatānantāraṃ (2 illegible syllables.) vādisammatatvādupamānāt prā(1 illegible syllable.) numānaṃ nirupyate . tatrantavi (gap due to broken folio.)
apa-1v-2 tya jñānamanumitiḥ . tatkaraṇamanumānaṃ tacca liṅgaparāmarṣaḥ . tat parāmarśyamānaṃ liṃgamityagrevanmate . athānumānapramāṇaṃ …
msItem.explicit:
apa-xv-4 tasya ayaṃ prastaraūbhayasya yantā āśiśyema vanhirataḥ pṛthivyāṃ cakru? śi vandhyā yuvatissuverāḥ devā deṣeṣu parākramadhvaṃ . dakṣiṇenāhavaniyya
apa-xv-5 mavasthāya . ayaṃ pitṛṇāṃ mahiḥ . yājamānaṃ [sukhāsyāmaḥ?] yājamānañca tvaśśikhṇḍādaśahotāraṃ somasyāhañcatvāri .. hariḥ oṃ śūbamastu .
msItem.finalRubric: apa-xv-6 ityāpastaṃbasūtre caturthaḥ praśnaḥ .. darśapūrṇamāsaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ , karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ . śrīgurucaraṇārandābhyāṃ namaḥ . hariḥ oṃ .
